comments.body:
@dyst5422 Great PR üëç 

One problem I see is the inconsistency in indent (4vs2). But I think it should be handled in separate PR. Ideally, someone would copy [.prettierrc](https://github.com/graphql/graphql-js/blob/master/.prettierrc) from `graphql-js` and run it on the entire `types/graphql/` folder.
Fair enough. I didn't want to run prettier since it would use my own settings.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +521,525 @@
export type TypeExtensionNode =
  | ScalarTypeExtensionNode
  | ObjectTypeExtensionNode
  | InterfaceTypeExtensionNode
